resources.string: Fingerprint matches the one registered in your phone\'s settings
You don\'t have any suited hardware for using the fingerprint
The fingerprint sensor was unable to process your fingerprint.
The current fingerprint request has been running too long.
The fingerprint validation operation cannot be completed because there\'s not enough storage remaining to complete the operation.
The operation was canceled because the fingerprint sensor is unavailable.
The operation was canceled because the API is locked out due to too many attempts.
This is what a vendor\'s device might show.
The operation was canceled because the fingerprint validation locked your device too often.
